resources.string: The main idea of our app is to let parents Check the location of their children. So parents should Login after registration,then they will have the ability to add the child location and save it, also They will add the username Of their child. Child here can start in this app by registering. This app will send Notification to parent if child is still in the same location or not.
We Will Help You To Check Your Child Every time Using Online Services

Enter Your Child Username
 If This Username Is Incorrect 
-> You Cannot Register
 In This App
Start Checking Every 15 min Or Stop Cheking
